document.full_text: <xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan"> </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#a8bcff">Soto! </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#a8bcff">Explore </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#a8bcff">thyself! </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Therein </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#a8bcff">thyself </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#a8bcff">shalt </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#a8bcff">find </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">The </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#a8bcff">"Undiscovered </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#a8bcff">Continent" </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">No </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#a8bcff">Settler </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">had </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">the </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#a8bcff">Mind. </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word"> </xhtml:span></xhtml:p>
